page.title: 09Rail Transport - Caerphilly
page.content: There are two{railway stations in the Caerphilly area. Caerphilly station serves the town area and Aber Halt serves the outskirts of Caerphilly. Caerphilly station provides a Park and Ride car park for commuters and shoppers going to Cardiff. Twenty seven trains run frequently during weekdays between 5a.m. and 11.15p.m. There are seven early morning{commuter trains}between 5a.m. and 9a.m. On Sundays eight trains run to Cardiff in the afternoon only between 2.44p.m. and 9.49p.m. There are also train services from Caerphilly to Penarth and Barry. From Cardiff there are connections to London and other major cities.
